attributes.action: Out of control cost of living crisis with no plan to help all, and not the few.
attributes.additional_details: This tory government is more interested in securing power at the next election than it is dealing with todays financial crisis. Its not just lowest earners and elderly, its middle earners aswell that cannot meet the cost of living.
attributes.background: We call for a vote of no confidence and demand an autumn general election.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments. This includes requesting that a vote of no confidence in the Government be held.

You might like to sign the following petition:

Call an immediate general election to end the chaos of the current government
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781
